name: Prop Overflow
description:
Prop Overflow – fun & short 3d physics-responsive platformer game, in which the main goal is to have fun. Complete unusual quests and don't forget about specific rules that each level has to offer, by obeying them you will complete the game faster. Accompanied by a vibrant soundtrack, Prop Overflow is a decent game to play while drinking your evening tea. 

Please, remind yourself of the fact that it is our first game ever made. We know of timer, sound, particle bugs. We didn't have enough time to master these aspects.

Authors: 8slash development team.
1. LOZH - coding.
2. gbeorg23 - level design, idea.
3. Legion - models.
4. \varphi - music.
